text: Youren dui tamen xuandu wo de mingxian de jixiang de shihou, naxie bu xiwang huijian wo de ren shuo:“Qing ni ling na yi bu “gulanjing” lai, huozhe qing ni xiugai zhe bu “gulanjing”.” Ni shuo:“Wo bu zhiyu shanzi xiugai ta. Wo zhi neng zuncong wo suo shou de qishi. Ruguo wo weikang wo de zhu, wo dique weiju zhongda ri de xingfa.”
